# Create epic in project

Execute the **epic** workflow as a **Functional Analyst**.

See full role instructions: [AGENT_FA.md](../../.teamspec/agents/AGENT_FA.md)

## Workflow

Create Epic (story container):
1. Define epic goal and scope
2. Link to Feature-Increment(s)
3. Identify candidate stories
4. Create epic-PRX-NNN-description.md using template
5. Update epics-index.md

## Template

Use template: `/.teamspec/templates/epic-template.md`

## Output

projects/{id}/epics/epic-PRX-*.md
